name: OCKDetailedContactView
desc: A view that displays detailed information for a contact.

items.name: var delegate: OCKContactViewDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles important events in a contact view.

items.name: let headerView: OCKHeaderView
items.desc: A header view that shows an icon image view and a separator.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A view that arranges its children vertically, and holds the main content in the view.

items.name: let instructionsLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A multi-line label underneath the header view.

items.name: static let defaultImage: UIImage
items.desc: A placeholder image that can be used for the icon image view.

items.name: let addressButton: OCKAddressButton
items.desc: A button for the contacts address that displays a location image, title label, and detail label.

items.name: let callButton: OCKContactButton
items.desc: A button that calls the contact, that displays a phone image and a title label.

items.name: let emailButton: OCKContactButton
items.desc: A button that emails a contact, that displays an email image and title label.

items.name: let messageButton: OCKContactButton
items.desc: A button that messages the contact, that displays a messages images and title label.
